immediate_danger_signs: Explicit statements of intent to harm self or others
Saying goodbye or giving away possessions
Sudden mood improvement after depression (may indicate decision made)
high_concern_signs: Changes in sleeping or eating patterns
Engaging in risky or self-destructive behavior
Saying goodbye to friends and family
warning_signs: Loss of interest in favorite activities

actions: If explicit threat, consider contacting emergency services (911)
Do not leave user alone if in-person
Remove access to means of harm if possible
Stay with person until help arrives

legal_disclaimers.monitoring_disclosure: This system monitors AI conversations for safety purposes. Parents/guardians have consented to monitoring on behalf of minors under their care.
legal_disclaimers.not_medical_advice: This system provides alerts based on pattern detection and is not a substitute for professional mental health evaluation or treatment.
legal_disclaimers.confidentiality_limits: While we strive to protect privacy, confidentiality may be broken when there is imminent risk of harm to self or others, or when required by law.
legal_disclaimers.professional_consultation: Always consult with qualified mental health professionals for assessment and treatment recommendations.
